data.name: Gas Station Simulator - Shady Deals DLC
data.detailed_description:
TRY YOUR HAND IN FOOD TRUCK SIMULATOR AND ADD IT TO YOUR WISHLIST

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1160920/Food_Truck_Simulator/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1897030/Prison_King

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1940030/Gas_Station_Simulator__Can_Touch_This_DLC/

The Uncle is Back!

And there you thought you are done with your uncle. Well, he’s back now with a new business proposition and needs your assistance to get it off the ground. You must have noticed he is less of businessman and more a “businessman”. Now he shows what’s he really about and the deal he has in mind is going to be shady…

All The Dots

A new business needs a new place and you are going to help your uncle build one: the All The Dots “pub” where shady deals can be conducted and a slew of new, unsavoury characters can be meet - each with their own story and deals.

Shady Deals

As you know, your gas station needs a lot of various goods to run. From fuel, parts to goods you sell at the store. With shady deals you get the opportunity to get some of those from less than reputable sources now at a great price…unless things go wrong.

There are also other interesting avenues to pursue. How about some moon shine? I mean you are already going to set up a “pub” of sorts at the gas station, why not go all the way and provide your own goods? And that is just the beginning of it…

And So Much More

The Shady Deals DLC will offer a lot more than the above. It is a significantly larger than the previous DLC and some of the things you can look forward to include avoiding taxes, brawls or new interactions with the police.
And did you know your gas station stands on a small oil reservoir? What could be shadier than placing your own, illegal oil drill and take the business to a new level?

data.short_description: The uncle is back! And he has a new business on his mind… Build new things on your gas station and make some shady deals!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Ukrainian, Finnish, Italian, Thai, Hungarian, Portuguese, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contain light violence or suggestions of violence in form of brawls and/or bar fights. This DLC also features alcohol.
